titles.title: VERY Act of 2025
Veterans Employment Readiness Yield Act of 2025
VERY Act of 2025
Veterans Employment Readiness Yield Act of 2025
VERY Act of 2025
Veterans Employment Readiness Yield Act of 2025
VERY Act of 2025
Veterans Employment Readiness Yield Act of 2025
VERY Act of 2025
To amend title 38, United States Code, to update certain terminology regarding veteran employment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs. H. Rept. 119-171.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 137.

action.text: Mr. Bost moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2625.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

committee.name: House Veterans' Affairs
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary:
Veterans Employment Readiness Yield Act of 2025 or the VERY Act of 2025
This bill revises terminology used under the Veteran Readiness and Employment program, specifically by replacing the use of employment handicap with employment barrier.
